select t.*,e.dispname, (case when t.`status`=3 then 3 when t.`status`=2 and aa.role=1 then 2 when t.`status`=2 and aa.role=2 then 3 when t.`status`=1 and aa.role=1 then 2 when t.`status`=1 and aa.role=2 then 1 end) as optype from tk_task t left join md_employee e on e.userid=t.createby inner join ( select 1 as role, m.companyid as compid ,m.userid as userid from md_company_member m where companyid=#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} UNION select 2 as role,w.compid as compid, w.memberid as userid from md_department_member w where w.memberid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deptid=#{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and w.memberid not in (select m1.userid from md_company_member m1 where companyid=#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) )aa on t.compid = aa.compid where t.deptdutyid=#{dutyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select 2 as biztype, w3.insid as bizid, u3.compid, m3.logo as complogo, w3.insname as title, w3.remark, '待审批' as statusname, 3 as optype, d3.deptname, '' as taskenddt, u3.createdate as ordertime from wf_instance_node_approve_user u3 left join wf_instance w3 on u3.insid=w3.insid left join md_company m3 on m3.companyid=u3.compid left join md_department d3 on d3.deptid=u3.deptid
where u3.`status`=1 and u3.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UNION
select 1 as biztype, t.taskid as bizid, t.compid, c.logo as complogo, d.dutyname as title, t.remark, case when t.`status`=1 then '' else '待考核' end as statusname, 2 as optype, e.deptname, DATE_FORMAT(t.enddt,'%m 月 %d 日 ') as taskenddt, t.updatedate as ordertime from tk_task t left join md_company c on c.companyid = t.compid left join md_deptduty d on d.dutyid=t.deptdutyid left join md_department e on e.deptid=t.deptid where t.compid in (select m.companyid from md_company_member m where m.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and t.`status` in(1,2)
UNION
select 1 as biztype, t1.taskid as bizid, t1.compid, c1.logo as complogo, d1.dutyname as title, t1.remark, '待执行' as statusname, 1 as optype, e1.deptname, DATE_FORMAT(t1.enddt,'%m 月 %d 日 ') as taskenddt, t1.updatedate as ordertime from tk_task t1 left join md_company c1 on c1.companyid = t1.compid left join md_deptduty d1 on d1.dutyid=t1.deptdutyid left join md_department e1 on e1.deptid=t1.deptid where t1.deptid in (select m2.deptid from md_department_member m2 where m2.memberid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and t1.compid not in (select m1.companyid from md_company_member m1 where m1.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and t1.`status` =1
